sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Rare Disease Commission Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Rare Disease Commission Act.

sections.heading: Definitions. As used in this Act, unless the context requires otherwise:
sections.text: Definitions. As used in this Act, unless the context requires otherwise:

sections.heading: Study; recommendations. The Commission shall make recommendations to the General Assembly, in the form of an annual report through 2026, regarding:
sections.text: Study; recommendations. The Commission shall make recommendations to the General Assembly, in the form of an annual report through 2026, regarding:

sections.heading: Administrative support.  The Department of Public Health shall provide administrative and other support to the Commission.
sections.text: Administrative support. The Department of Public Health shall provide administrative and other support to the Commission.

sections.heading: Repeal. This Act is repealed on January 1, 2027.
sections.text: Repeal. This Act is repealed on January 1, 2027.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect January 1, 2017.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect January 1, 2017.
